comments.raw_text:
Specifically, for containers that can contain overflow containers, it requires 3 hashtable lookups.  This is showing up in my profiles of "silly" restyling where none of the styles have actually changed as about 8% of the total time.

I'm not sure whether we want to burn some framestate bits on optimizing those hashtable lookups away or some such.
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu

comments.text: Actually, it's closer to 13%; the 8% is just non-block containers...
